text.div:
Id: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Hib.3doseswithboosterdose
Url: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Version: 0.2.0
Title: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Status: draft
Date: 2025-07-17 20:56:25+0000
Publisher: WHO
Description:

Determine required vaccinations
Knowledge Capability: computable
Related Artifacts:

References

  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)
Libraries:
DTs.Hib
Actions:
Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" Because serious Hib disease occurs most commonly in children aged 4–18 months, immunization should start from 6 weeks of age, or as early as possible thereafter. The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks if 3 primary doses are given. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client is less than 6 weeks old. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for Hib vaccination: Client is due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for Hib vaccination: Client is due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second Hib dose as client's age was less than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Hib immunization schedule is complete: Hib immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines") When a first dose is given to a child older than 12 months of age, only one dose is recommended.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Hib immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Hib immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks if 3 primary doses are given. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third Hib dose as the latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for Hib vaccination: Client is due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Primary series is complete. Client is not due for Hib booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for Hib booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines") Booster doses should be administered at least 6 months after completion of the primary series.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is not due for Hib booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with Hib booster dose as the latest Hib dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Hib primary series is complete. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for booster dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Primary series is complete. Client is due for Hib booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is due for Hib booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is due for Hib booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with Hib booster dose as primary series is complete and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Hib immunization schedule is complete: Hib immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" –
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Hib immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Hib immunization schedule is complete. Three Hib primary series doses and one booster dose have been administered. Check for any vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for Hib vaccination: Client is not due for Hib vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" –
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for Hib vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with Hib dose as client is more than 5 years old and Hib vaccination is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

relatedArtifact.citation: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

action.title: Client is not due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

Because serious Hib disease occurs most commonly in children aged 4–18 months, immunization should start from 6 weeks of age, or as early as possible thereafter. The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks if 3 primary doses are given. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client is less than 6 weeks old. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

action.title: Client is due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with first Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Client is not due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with second Hib dose as latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.

action.title: Client is due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with second Hib dose as client's age was less than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Hib immunization schedule is complete
action.description:
Hib immunization schedule is complete
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")

When a first dose is given to a child older than 12 months of age, only one dose is recommended.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Hib immunization schedule is complete as client's age was more than 1 year when first Hib dose was administered.
Check for any other vaccines due.

action.title: Client is not due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

The interval between doses should be at least 4 weeks if 3 primary doses are given. Hib-containing vaccine is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with third Hib dose as the latest Hib dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third dose.

action.title: Client is due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with third Hib dose as client is within appropriate age range and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for Hib booster dose
action.description:
Primary series is complete. Client is not due for Hib booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")

Booster doses should be administered at least 6 months after completion of the primary series.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with Hib booster dose as the latest Hib dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Hib primary series is complete. 
Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for booster dose.

action.title: Primary series is complete. Client is due for Hib booster dose
action.description:
Primary series is complete. Client is due for Hib booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Hib-containing vaccines")

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with Hib booster dose as primary series is complete and the latest Hib dose was administered more than 6 months ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Hib immunization schedule is complete
action.description:
Hib immunization schedule is complete
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

–

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Hib immunization schedule is complete. Three Hib primary series doses and one booster dose have been administered. 
Check for any vaccines due.

action.title: Client is not due for Hib vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for Hib vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

–

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with Hib dose as client is more than 5 years old and Hib vaccination is not required for healthy children aged over 5 years. 
Check for any other vaccines due.
